# File lib/icalendar/component.rb, line 126
    def print_properties
      s = ""

      @properties.each do |key,val| 
        # Take out underscore for property names that conflicted
        # with built-in words.
        if key =~ /ip_.*/
          key = key[3..-1]
        end

        # Property name
        s << "#{key.upcase}" + 

        # Possible parameters
        print_parameters(val) + 

        # Property value
        ":#{val.to_ical}\r\n" 
      end

      s
    end
